name: Code Code BP UI - Branding & Modification Rules
description: MCP configuration enforcing strict branding and modification policies

modification_policy.description: DO NOT add, edit, or remove any part of any element until explicitly asked
restrictions: No adding new components, features, or code without explicit request
No editing existing code, styles, or configurations without explicit request
No removing code, comments, or functionality without explicit request
No refactoring or improvements unless specifically asked
No proactive changes or suggestions implemented without approval
modification_policy.action: ASK FIRST before making ANY changes

restrictions: DO NOT use any font other than San Francisco
DO NOT introduce new fonts without explicit approval
DO NOT introduce new colors without explicit approval
DO NOT modify the primary color
Use only #00c307 for primary brand color
Use existing color tokens already in the repository

rules.rule: Do not edit demo/ folder files
rules.description: demo/ is read-only and the canonical source of components

rules.rule: Do not use components stored outside demo/ folder
rules.description: All UI components must originate from demo/

rules.rule: Do not add or invent colors or fonts
rules.description: Use only San Francisco font and #00c307 primary color

rules.rule: Read and follow these rules before writing any code
Keep fresh copy in donor branch
rules.description: Branch donor must contain untouched demo/ and working starter/ snapshot

steps.name: Explore demo/ first
steps.description: Read all files in demo/, understand components, props, styles, and examples
steps.output: Master list of all available components

steps.name: Create components list in starter/
steps.description: Add file at starter/COMPONENTS_FROM_DEMO.md listing all components

steps.name: Build pages only in starter/
steps.description: Create pages/experiments in starter/ using demo/ components as-is
restrictions: Never move components into starter/ for permanent edits
Create wrappers in starter/ that compose demo/ components if modifications needed

steps.name: Experiment → Approve → Freeze
steps.description: Iterate until satisfied, then freeze page version

steps.name: Component changes process (rare & formal)
steps.description: If demo/ component must change, open PR with justification
requirements: Until PR merges, experiment in starter/ via wrappers

steps.name: No UI outside these rules
steps.description: Even for quick hacks, work in starter/
steps.action: Mark temporary code as 'TEMP — remove after demo'

branching.donor: Contains untouched copies of demo/ and starter/

items: Did I read demo/ fully for the component I want to use?
Am I editing starter/ and not demo/?
Am I using only the provided fonts and colors?
Did I create/confirm donor branch snapshot?
If modifying demo/, did I open a PR with justification and approvals?
Was I explicitly asked to make this change?
Am I using San Francisco font (not Inter or any other font)?
Am I using the primary color #00c307 (not any other green)?

golden_rules: ASK before changing anything - Never add, edit, or remove without explicit request
San Francisco font ONLY - No exceptions, no alternatives
Primary color #00c307 ONLY - Use the exact vibrant green specified
